content: FRANKFURT  July 17 German drugs packager Gerresheimer has acquired an exclusive licence for a syringe-safety solution from U.S.-based West Pharmaceutical Services  completing its portfolio of pre-fillable glass and plastic syringes  it said on Monday.
name: West Pharmaceutical Services Inc
title: Gerresheimer licenses syringe safety solution from West
